summary:
As an Electrical Engineer at WTT - Waste Treatment Technologies, I apply my skills and technical knowledge of electrical discipline, control systems, power distribution systems, and building electrical design systems to design and execute international projects. I have over five years of experience in the field of electrical engineering, and I am proficient in EPLAN Software and IEC Standards. 

I am also responsible for conducting Factory Acceptance Tests (FAT) and collaborating with multidisciplinary teams to provide technical expertise in electrical engineering aspects of Site Acceptance Tests (SAT). I lead troubleshooting efforts and resolve complex electrical issues in a timely manner, minimizing downtime. I implement preventive maintenance procedures, resulting in improved equipment reliability. My mission is to deliver high-quality and compliant solutions that meet the needs and expectations of our clients.

treasury_media.title: Data Wrangling, Analysis and AB Testing with SQL.pdf
Sustainable Urban Heat Solution
treasury_media.description: Global warming is a problem ,so The Netherlands, have singed The Paris Agreement. This includes reducing the usage of natural gas. To reach the goals, natural gas needs to be replaced with sustainable heat solutions . This project focuses on making a tool for the sustainable heat solutions , delivers an appropriate, natural gas free, heat solution for different kinds of customers. Solutions for a single house, district of a house, fabrics, utility buildings and farmers can be also provided.

projects.title: Bussiness Plan: Qatar Brands
projects.description: Qatar Brands (www.QatarBrands.com) is a comprehensive guide website that brings together a large number of local businesses with services that let the people to follow with the latest offers and updates from these businesses, through SMSs and Emails, by subscribing to the wanted business. Additionally, the website will also provide integrated platform for the Entrepreneurs (Advertisers) to setup their own website in few minutes, under their own management to choose the look, without going into the technical complexities of programming, design and hosting, plus their appearance within the comprehensive guide of Qatar Brands Website.

contributors.headline: Founder at Awatif.co | Software Developer | Structural Engineer

projects.title: Business Plan: Qatar Entertainment and Services Web-Site
projects.description:
Providing a business plan that will be a big advantage for Qatar, speciously the *Youth* of Qatar who are between 13 and 34, and also the tourists who come to Qatar. Our vision is to make the youth happy and having fun and enjoying their time and their stay here in Qatar. According to a survey that we did about the weekend, where do people go? And what do they do?, we found out that a lot of young people don’t know where to go and what to do, they almost keep on going to same places every weekend, and therefore we came up with this idea .  Our mission statement is to be the leading web-site that has to deal with promoting events and provides services in Qatar. Our customers will be the youth of Qatar who live in Doha or even outside Doha, and speciously those who are between 15 and 30 years old. Not forgetting that anyone else can join in.
The business plan is a web-site that provides information about Qatar’s entertainment, the events that are going to happen in Qatar, and also a lot of services that are going to help the people of Qatar. It’s also going to be very helpful for anyone else who doesn't live in Qatar and would like to come and visit as a tourist.
In more details, our web-site provides information about the events that are going to happen in Qatar, information about Qatar, everything that has to deal with Qatar’s events, in sports, concerts, and more.

projects.title: PLC System- Filling Machine
projects.description: This project shows the logical programming process control work that has been done and its results about a Filling Machine Project- The main purpose of this project is to fill and cover a box between 1 Kg to 9 Kg, then move it by a conveyor built. In addition to for the student to apply the technical knowledge & learning that was gained from PLC Process Course.

projects.title: Graduation Project: Laser Light Show System.
projects.description: A small model of a laser light show system. This system is controlled by a PLC and moved by inexpensive RC Servo motors. The main goal for this project was to apply the technical knowledge and learning, that was gained from the College of the North Atlantic-Qatar

contributors.headline: Service Technologist at Argus Controls Systems

projects.title: Practical Electrical Design for a Commercial Building
projects.description:
The aim of this project was to design a practical electrical system for a commercial building, by accomplishing the following tasks:

1- Listing the Electrical requirements and systems 
2- Determining the number of required receptacles
3- Determining the required lighting fixtures Volt Amps
4- Implementing the lighting fixtures
5- Creating the wiring layout for the lighting fixtures
6- Creating the wiring layout for the receptacles

projects.title: Lighting System Design for a Classroom and an Office at CNA-Q
projects.description:
This is a project about designing a lighting system for class 9-109 and office 9-283 
The given IL luminance level for both rooms is 500 lux. There were differences in the reflectance of the surfaces, therefore a change in the coefficient of utilization was expected. 
	The Light Loss Factor was slightly different between the two rooms and the number of luminaire for both rooms had changed. Plus the initial and final IL luminance level for the office room.

projects.title: Making a Power Distribution Panel
projects.description: The purpose of the project was to make a Distribution Panel, which is a Panel that is responsible for supplying electrical power to individual circuits.

projects.title: Business Idea: LAWHA
projects.description:
Our vision is to make those who own a house, office, etc.  satisfied with the paintings/portraits that they are hanging on their walls. 

 LAWHA came up with a spectacular idea for customers who are between 30 to 60 years old interested in getting unique and different paintings/portraits created from images of THEIR OWN DNA, FINGER-PRINTS, OR EVEN THEIR OWN LIP-STICK KISS, AND TURN THEM TO PAINTING/PORTRAITS, that is why we think our idea is unique and different.

The customers will chose the style of the portrait that they want, a collection kit will be given to them to provide us their DNA samples, then a lab will extracts the DNA, look for specific gens to create a one of a kind profile and print to be turned into an oil painting.

projects.title: Youth to Entrepreneur Forum
projects.description: The event took place June 11th to June 12th (10am-7pm) at Qatar Foundation Student Center in Ballrooms 1, 2, & 3.  It was an event that aimed to improve the entrepreneurial outlook of Qatar through providing a platform for young entrepreneurs to access valuable resources to advance their start-ups and/or ideas.  The event included a career fair for start-ups to access human capital to help run their businesses, a trade exposition to market and advertise their products & services, a networking event to access key stakeholders, a panel discussion that aimed to address bottlenecks in the start-up process in Qatar, as well as several valuable workshops to acquire knowledge from experts in the field of entrepreneurship. Organized by AIESEC and Bedaya Center
